import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const UCSP = () => { const [activeGroup, setActiveGroup] = useState('group1'); const groupContent = { group1: { title: "Group 1", icon: "fas fa-dragon", description: "Discover the ancient wisdom and traditions of Asia, from the philosophy of Confucius to the art of tea ceremonies.", content: (
{/* Ancient Philosophies */}

Ancient Philosophies

Asian philosophy encompasses diverse traditions including Confucianism, Taoism, Buddhism, and Hinduism. These philosophies emphasize harmony, balance, and the interconnectedness of all things.

  • • Confucianism: Ethics, family values, and social harmony
  • • Taoism: Natural balance and the way of nature
  • • Buddhism: Enlightenment and the path to inner peace
  • • Hinduism: Dharma, karma, and spiritual liberation
{/* Cultural Traditions */}

Cultural Traditions

From tea ceremonies to martial arts, Asian cultures have developed sophisticated traditions that reflect their deep respect for nature, community, and spiritual growth.

  • • Tea ceremonies: Mindfulness and hospitality
  • • Martial arts: Discipline and self-improvement
  • • Calligraphy: Art and spiritual expression
  • • Festivals: Celebrating seasons and traditions
) }, group2: { title: "Group 2", icon: "fas fa-music", description: "Experience the vibrant rhythms, rich storytelling traditions, and diverse tribal cultures of Africa.", content: (
{/* Music & Dance */}

Music & Dance

African music and dance are deeply rooted in tradition and spirituality, serving as forms of communication, celebration, and storytelling across generations.

  • • Traditional drums: Djembe, talking drums, and ceremonial instruments
  • • Dance forms: Ritual dances, social dances, and performance arts
  • • Oral traditions: Griots and musical storytelling
  • • Modern influence: Afrobeat, jazz, and global music
{/* Tribal Cultures */}

Diverse Tribal Cultures

Africa is home to thousands of distinct ethnic groups, each with unique customs, languages, and social structures that have evolved over centuries.

  • • Maasai: Nomadic pastoralists with distinctive traditions
  • • Zulu: Warrior culture and complex social systems
  • • Yoruba: Rich mythology and artistic traditions
  • • Berber: Ancient North African nomadic cultures
) }, group3: { title: "Group 3", icon: "fas fa-landmark", description: "Journey through the Renaissance, classical music, and architectural marvels that define European heritage.", content: (
{/* Historical Periods */}

Historical Periods

European history spans from ancient civilizations to modern nation-states, each period contributing to the continent's rich cultural tapestry.

  • • Ancient Greece: Democracy, philosophy, and classical art
  • • Roman Empire: Law, engineering, and imperial culture
  • • Middle Ages: Feudalism, chivalry, and Gothic architecture
  • • Renaissance: Humanism, art, and scientific discovery
{/* Art & Architecture */}

Art & Architecture

European art and architecture have influenced global aesthetics, from classical proportions to avant-garde movements that challenge traditional forms.

  • • Classical architecture: Greek temples and Roman monuments
  • • Gothic cathedrals: Soaring spires and stained glass
  • • Renaissance art: Perspective, humanism, and realism
  • • Modern movements: Impressionism, Cubism, and beyond
) }, group4: { title: "Group 4", icon: "fas fa-star", description: "Explore the melting pot of cultures, from Native American traditions to modern pop culture influences.", content: (
{/* Native American Heritage */}

Native American Heritage

The indigenous peoples of the Americas have rich cultural traditions that span thousands of years, from spiritual practices to sustainable living.

  • • Spiritual traditions: Connection to nature and ancestors
  • • Art and crafts: Pottery, weaving, and beadwork
  • • Oral traditions: Storytelling and cultural preservation
  • • Sustainable practices: Environmental wisdom and respect
{/* Immigrant Cultures */}

Immigrant Cultures

America's strength lies in its diversity, with immigrants bringing their traditions, languages, and customs to create a vibrant cultural mosaic.

  • • European immigrants: Italian, Irish, German, and Polish traditions
  • • Asian communities: Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and South Asian cultures
  • • Latin American influence: Mexican, Cuban, and Caribbean heritage
  • • African diaspora: Cultural contributions and resilience
) } }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

UCSP

Understanding Culture, Society, and Politics - Explore our group presentations and research.

Homepage
{/* Group Tabs */}
{Object.keys(groupContent).map((groupKey) => ( ))}
{/* Group Content */}
{/* Group Header */}

{groupContent[activeGroup].title}

{groupContent[activeGroup].description}

{/* Group Content */} {groupContent[activeGroup].content}
{/* About UCSP Section */}

About UCSP

Understanding Culture, Society, and Politics (UCSP) is a course that explores the dynamic relationships between culture, society, and politics. Through our group presentations, we examine how these three elements interact and influence each other in different contexts around the world.

Culture

Shared beliefs, values, and practices that shape human behavior

Society

Social structures and relationships that organize human communities

Politics

Power dynamics and governance systems that regulate social life

); }; export default UCSP;
